name: FallJump
description:
This game was made for ScoreSpace Jam #22.

Use WASD to move, SPACE button to jump.

Dodge falling blocks. Collect boosts. Stay alive.

gun scares away zombies. The potion gives speed. Coins increase the score

assets that have been used:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/farland-skies-simple-cumulus-62565
